prefixIntroduce: *Please make sure that the domain name prefix is correct, for example: 'www'.
domainIntroduce: * Please make sure the domain name is filled in correctly, for example: 'hoge.cn'.
siteIntroduce: * The site name is displayed on the browser's title bar and on the Microsoft Windows taskbar
logoIntroduce: * It is recommended to use PNG / JPEG format picture, size 140 * 100 px
wordIntroduce: * Can contain multiple keywords separated by commas
versionMsg: The current MXU system version for the MXU Ultimate, support the creation of 10 sites.
creator: Creator
sortTip: The sort function is turned on
